posts.title: Sweeten Up Your Life with NOW Foods Organic Erythritol Powder: Emma's Revie
posts.content:
Do you have a sweet tooth but can't handle the sugar rush? Look no further than NOW Foods Organic Confectioner's Erythritol Powder! As someone with an egg sensitivity, I know firsthand the importance of finding alternatives for certain ingredients. Erythritol is a sugar alcohol that acts as a fantastic replacement for traditional powdered sugar. It's perfect for frosting and dusting over your favorite desserts, and has zero calories to boot.

One of the best things about NOW Foods Organic Erythritol Powder is how easy it is to use. Simply swap it in for powdered sugar in your favorite recipes and voila! You get the same sweet taste without any of the guilt or negative health effects. Plus, it's low-glycemic and doesn't contribute to tooth decay, making it a great alternative for those with dietary restrictions.

Whether you're looking for an egg-free cookie recipe or a substitute for breading, erythritol has got you covered. It's a fantastic ingredient to have on hand for those with sudden egg intolerance or egg allergies, or anyone looking to cut down on their sugar intake. And with NOW Foods Organic Confectioner's Erythritol Powder, you get the added bonus of it being organic and non-GMO.

Pro:
- Zero calories
- Low-glycemic
- Organic and non-GMO
- Great replacement for powdered sugar
- Perfect for those with dietary restrictions

Con:
- Can have a slight cooling effect when used in large amounts

In conclusion, NOW Foods Organic Confectioner's Erythritol Powder is a fantastic alternative sweetener for those with egg sensitivity or anyone looking to cut down on their sugar intake. It's easy to use, has zero calories, and doesn't contribute to tooth decay. Plus, it's organic and non-GMO, making it a great choice for those with dietary restrictions. So go ahead and sweeten up your life with erythritol - your taste buds (and your body) will thank you!

Bottom Line: 8.5/10

product.name: NOW Foods, Organic Confectioner's Erythritol Powder, Replacement for Powdered Sugar, Zero Calories, 1-Pound (Packaging May Vary)

posts.title: Whole Earth Allulose Baking Blend: The Sweetest Brown Sugar Substitute
posts.content:
As a baker with a passion for creating delicious treats that cater to those with egg allergies or intolerances, I was excited to try the Whole Earth Allulose Baking Blend Brown Sugar Substitute. This plant-based sugar alternative is a game-changer, offering all the sweetness and flavor of traditional brown sugar without the calories. I couldn't wait to get baking!

This blend is perfect for anyone who wants to cut back on sugar without sacrificing flavor. It's easy to use, with a 1:1 ratio to brown sugar that makes it simple to swap out in any recipe. Plus, it tastes and bakes just like brown sugar, so you won't even notice the difference.

One of the best things about this blend is that it's made with allulose, a type of sweetener that's found in fruits like figs and raisins. Allulose helps make the blend very sugar-like when it comes to baking, while erythritol, a sugar alcohol found in fruits like pears and grapes, adds sweetness without impacting blood sugar significantly. The stevia and monk fruit extracts round out the flavor, providing the same 1:1 sweetness as sugar.

Pros:
- All the sweetness and flavor of traditional brown sugar without the calories
- Easy to use with a 1:1 ratio to brown sugar
- Made with allulose and erythritol, which do not impact blood sugar significantly
- Contains stevia and monk fruit extracts for added sweetness
- Tastes and bakes just like brown sugar

Cons:
- Color may be slightly lighter than traditional brown sugar

In conclusion, the Whole Earth Allulose Baking Blend Brown Sugar Substitute is a must-have for anyone looking to cut back on sugar without sacrificing flavor. It's perfect for baking, and the 1:1 ratio to brown sugar makes it easy to use in any recipe. While the color may be slightly lighter than traditional brown sugar, the taste and texture are spot on. I highly recommend this blend to anyone looking for a healthier alternative to brown sugar.

Bottom Line: 9/10

product.name: Whole Earth Allulose Baking Blend Brown Sugar Substitute, 12 Ounce Bag

posts.title: Stop the Woof Woof with the Sunbeam Sonic Egg - Review
posts.content:
As someone who loves dogs but can't stand their constant barking, I was excited to try out the Sunbeam Sonic Egg Bark Control Device. This egg-shaped gadget is the perfect tool to stop your furry friend from barking incessantly, without causing them any harm. The device emits an ultrasonic sound that only dogs can hear, which will make them stop barking and pay attention to you. And the best part? It works on any breed of dog!

The Sunbeam Sonic Egg is easy to use and can be operated with verbal commands like "No!" to trigger the bark deterrent sound. It has a range of 50 feet, so it's perfect for use in your backyard or even on a walk. The device is battery-operated and can be mounted on a wall, stand alone on a flat surface or attached to a tree or fence. It's a versatile device that can be used both indoors and outdoors.

This device is perfect for dog owners who want to train their pets to stop barking excessively. It's also a great option for people who live in close proximity to neighbors with dogs that bark too much. The Sunbeam Sonic Egg can also be used when walking your dog to help you keep them under control and prevent them from barking at other dogs or people passing by.

Pros:
- Easy to use and effective at stopping barking
- Pet-safe ultrasonic sound that doesn't harm dogs
- Can be used on any breed of dog
- Versatile mounting options and range of 50 feet
- Convenient and portable for use indoors and outdoors

Cons:
- Battery-operated, so it needs to be recharged or replaced
- May not be effective on dogs with severe barking problems
- May not be suitable for people with egg allergies (just kidding!)

In conclusion, the Sunbeam Sonic Egg Bark Control Device is a great tool for dog owners who want a safe and effective way to stop their pets from barking. Whether you're using it at home or on a walk, this device is easy to use and versatile enough to accommodate any situation. While it may not be suitable for dogs with severe barking problems, it's a great option for most pet owners. Overall, I give the Sunbeam Sonic Egg a rating of 8 out of 10.

One of the things I love about this product is how versatile it is. You can use it as a substitute for 1 egg in any recipe, or use it as a breading for meats and veggies. And if you're like me and don't have any flaxseed meal or chia seeds on hand, this is a great egg substitute for baking brownies or chocolate chip cookies. 

Of course, as with any product, there are pros and cons. Here's what I came up with: 

Pros:
- Tastes just like regular eggs
- Versatile and easy to use
- Long shelf life

Cons:
- A bit on the pricey side

Overall, I would definitely recommend Augason Farms Dried Whole Egg Powder to anyone with an egg allergy or intolerance. It's a great substitute that won't compromise taste or texture in your favorite recipes. And if you're looking for a substitute for chia seed or flaxseed meal, this is a great option.

Are you an egg-free baker in need of a vanilla extract that packs an extra punch? Look no further than McCormick's All Natural Pure Vanilla Extract! Made with the finest Madagascar vanilla beans, this extract is all-natural, non-GMO, and free of gluten and corn syrup. And let's be real, we all need a little extra sweetness in our lives, amirite?

As someone with an egg allergy myself, I know how frustrating it can be to find the right egg substitute for baking. But fear not, this vanilla extract can be used in a variety of egg-free recipes, from banana bread to brownies to cornbread without egg. And let's not forget about pancakes and waffles! This extract pairs perfectly with your favorite vegan egg substitute for waffles that are sure to impress.

But let's talk about the real star of the show: the flavor. McCormick's Pure Vanilla Extract has a strong, floral-like sweetness with hints of bourbon, rum, and dried fruit. It's the perfect addition to your holiday baking, making your gingerbread cookies and pumpkin pies stand out from the crowd. Plus, you can feel good knowing that McCormick has long-standing relationships with experienced vanilla bean growers, investing in higher incomes and resiliency for thousands of farmers.

Pros:
- All-natural, non-GMO, and free of gluten and corn syrup
- Made with premium Madagascar vanilla beans for a strong, floral-like sweetness
- Can be used in a variety of egg-free recipes, from cakes to cookies to cornbread
- McCormick invests in their farmers, supporting higher incomes and resiliency for thousands of farming families

Cons:
- Only comes in a 1 fl oz bottle, so you may need to stock up if you're a frequent baker

In conclusion, McCormick's All Natural Pure Vanilla Extract is a must-have for any egg-free baker looking to add some extra flavor to their recipes. With its premium quality and versatile use, it's sure to become a staple in your kitchen. So get baking, and don't forget to add a splash of McCormick's Pure Vanilla Extract for that extra sweetness! 

Bottom Line: 8.5/10

product.name: McCormick All Natural Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz

posts.title: Hatching Time with CT120 SH: The Egg-cellent Incubator for Budding Farmers
posts.content:

This egg-tastic machine is perfect for those looking to start their own poultry farm or just keep a few animals in the backyard. 

The CT120 SH is a highly insulated cabinet incubator that offers a fully automated incubation experience. It has adjustable automatic egg turners and humidity/temperature sensors to encourage higher hatching rates and lower electrical bills. Plus, Cimuka's advanced control panel even has an alarm function to alert you if the hatch conditions change outside of your preset parameters. Talk about high-tech!

This eggcellent product can be used for chicken, quail, turkey, partridge, pheasant, peacock, goose, and duck eggs. The egg turners are vibration-free and calibrated, ensuring high hatching rates and minimal energy use. The ventilation system is IP55 certified, protecting you from voltage changes and offering first-class protection from dust and humidity. Plus, the Humisonic system provides humidity to the incubator when necessary. Just add water to the top tank!

While the CT120 SH is a pricier option at $849.99, it pays off in the long run. You'll be able to hatch more eggs with higher success rates, saving you money in the long run. Plus, it's perfect for anyone with an egg allergy or looking for an egg substitute for their favorite recipes.

CONS:

In conclusion, the Hatching Time CT120 SH Full Automatic Egg Incubator - Setter & Hatcher is the perfect option for those looking to start their own backyard poultry farm or hatch eggs with ease. posts.title: Baking Just Got Easier: Bellemain Stainless Steel Flour Sifter Review
posts.content:
Baking can be tough when you have food allergies or intolerances, especially when it comes to eggs. That's why I was so excited to try out the Bellemain Stainless Steel Flour Sifter. This little gadget made my egg-free baking experience so much easier!

First of all, the sifter itself is made of stainless steel, so it's durable and easy to clean. It has a three-cup capacity, so it's perfect for sifting flour, cocoa powder, or any dry ingredient you need for your recipe. It also has a hand crank that turns smoothly, so you can sift with ease.

The Bellemain sifter is perfect for anyone who wants to make baking a little easier. If you're someone who's dealing with sudden egg intolerance or just looking to avoid eggs altogether, this gadget will definitely come in handy. You can use it to sift flaxseed meal as an egg substitute for baking brownies or chia seeds as an egg replacement for egg-free cookie recipes. It's also great for substituting applesauce for eggs or even using applesauce instead of eggs in breading.

Of course, like any product, there are pros and cons to the Bellemain sifter. Here's what I found:

Pros:
- Stainless steel construction is durable and easy to clean.
- Three-cup capacity is perfect for sifting dry ingredients.
- Hand crank turns smoothly and makes sifting easy.
- Great for those with egg allergies or intolerances who need to use egg substitutes.
- Can be used for a variety of dry ingredients.

Cons:
- Some users might prefer a sifter with a larger capacity.
- The handle can be a little difficult to turn if you're sifting a lot of flour at once.

Overall, I think the Bellemain Stainless Steel Flour Sifter is a great addition to any kitchen. If you're someone who struggles with egg allergies or intolerances, this sifter can make your baking experience a lot easier. And even if you don't have any food allergies, the Bellemain sifter is still a great gadget to have in your kitchen. I highly recommend it!

Bottom Line: The Bellemain Stainless Steel Flour Sifter is a great tool for anyone who loves to bake, especially those with egg allergies or intolerances. It's durable, easy to use, and perfect for sifting dry ingredients. I give it an 8 out of 10.

product.name: Bellemain Stainless Steel 3 Cup Flour Sifter

posts.title: A Prune-tastic Snack for the Egg-Allergy Queen: Sunny Fruit ORGANIC Prunes!
posts.content:
If you're anything like me, you're constantly on the lookout for snacks that are both healthy AND taste delicious. And if you also happen to have an egg allergy, it can feel like the options are slim. That's why I was so excited to try out Sunny Fruit's ORGANIC Prunes - they're the perfect snack for those of us who need to steer clear of lesauce instead of eggs.

First off, can we talk about the fact that these prunes are ORGANIC, VEGAN, and HALAL? That's a triple whammy of ethical, healthy goodness right there. And let's not forget that they're also NON-GMO and free from added sugars, sulfurs, and preservatives. Basically, they're the snack you've been waiting for.

But what about the taste? I'm happy to report that these prunes are juicy, sweet, and packed with flavor. They make for the perfect addition to a cheese board or charcuterie platter, and they also work great as a midday pick-me-up when you're feeling snacky. Plus, since they're dried plums, they've got all the fiber you need to keep things moving. 

Who would I recommend these prunes to? Well, anyone who loves a good snack, really. But especially those of us who are egg-free or looking for a gluten-free option. They're also great for folks who are trying to reduce their sugar intake, since there's no added sweetness here. And if you're into baking, you can even use these prunes as a substitute for one egg - just grind them up and mix with water to create a chia egg replacement. 

PROS:
- Organic, vegan, and halal
- Non-GMO and free from added sugars, sulfurs, and preservatives
- Juicy, sweet, and packed with flavor
- Great for snacking, baking, or adding to a cheese board
- Can be used as a substitute for one egg in baking

CONS:
- They're prunes, so if you're not into dried fruit, these might not be for you
- The color can be a bit dark, which might not be as visually appealing to some folks

In conclusion, I was really impressed with Sunny Fruit's ORGANIC Prunes. They're a delicious and healthy snack that are perfect for anyone who needs to avoid eggs or gluten. Plus, they're versatile enough to use in baking, as a substitute for one egg. I'm giving them an 8/10 rating - they're not perfect, but they're pretty darn close. Give them a try and see for yourself!

posts.title: RC Hearty Foundations™ Vegan GF FlavorMatch® Chicken Flavor Base: Cluck Yes
posts.content:
If you're looking for a chicken substitute in your recipes but are eggplant allergic or sensitive to egg, dairy, or meat, RC Fine Food's Vegan GF FlavorMatch® Chicken Flavor Base might just be your new go-to ingredient. As a food blogger and recipe developer who loves creating egg-free recipes, I was excited to give this chicken-flavored broth a try. 

The base comes in a 12-ounce container and can make 5 gallons of chicken-flavored broth, which is a great value for anyone who wants to make a large batch of soup, stew, or sauce. The granular base dissolves easily in hot water, and the final product has a golden color and a flavor that's pretty close to chicken broth. While I wouldn't say it is an exact replica of chicken broth, it definitely adds a savory umami flavor that can make your dishes taste more complex and satisfying. 

This chicken-flavored base is also gluten-free, vegan, and Kosher Pareve certified, which makes it a versatile ingredient for people with different dietary needs. I can see it being a great fit for anyone who wants to reduce their meat consumption or experiment with vegan cooking. It's also a good option for people who have sudden egg intolerance symptoms or delayed egg allergy symptoms, as it doesn't contain any egg products. 

While I enjoyed using this chicken-flavored base, there are a few things to consider before buying it. For one, the base contains a fair amount of salt, so you might want to adjust the seasoning of your recipe accordingly. Also, the final product might not have exactly the same color as chicken broth, which might not matter in some recipes but could be a deal-breaker for others. 

Pros: Vegan, GF, Kosher Pareve certified, adds savory flavor to dishes, good value for a large batch of broth. 
Cons: Contains salt, might not have the exact same color as chicken broth. 

Overall, I think RC Fine Food's Vegan GF FlavorMatch® Chicken Flavor Base is a solid option for anyone who wants to add a chicken-like flavor to their recipes without using any actual chicken. It's not a perfect substitute, but it can definitely elevate the taste of your dishes and make them more interesting. As someone who's always on the lookout for egg-free baking and cooking ingredients, I appreciate that the base is egg-free, dairy-free, and meat-free, too. My final rating for this product is 8 out of 10.

product.name: RC Fine Foods RC Hearty Foundations™ Vegan GF FlavorMatch® Chicken Flavor Base 12 oz Makes 5 Gallons of Chicken Flavored Broth Formulated Gluten Free Plant Based Pareve No Meat Dairy or Egg Products

posts.content:
Yo, what's up egg-free friends? This is Emma, back at it again with another egg substitute review! Today I'm talking about Top Seedz Certified USDA Organic Raw Black Chia Seeds, aka the little seeds with a big impact. If you're like me and can't do eggs, you know how important it is to have a trusty egg substitute in your pantry. Enter chia seeds, the OG of vegan egg substitutes. 

These Black Chia seeds from Top Seedz are the real deal. They're certified organic, gluten-free, paleo, and keto-friendly, so they fit into almost any diet you can think of. Plus, they're packed with nutrients like protein, fiber, iron, and magnesium. The best part? Chia seeds are an excellent vegan egg substitute for baking! Just mix 1 tbsp. of chia seeds with 3 tbsp. of water and let it sit for 5 minutes until it forms a gel-like texture. Then, use it in place of one egg in your favorite recipe. 

But wait, there's more! These raw Black Chia seeds are also great for snacking. They're unsalted, so you can enjoy them without worrying about getting too much sodium. I love adding them to my morning yogurt or smoothie bowl for some added crunch and nutrition. You can also sprinkle them on top of salads or roasted veggies for some extra flavor. And with a resealable bag, you can keep them fresh for all your snacking and baking needs. 

So, who would these Black Chia seeds be a good fit for? Anyone who can't eat eggs and is looking for an easy vegan egg substitute for baking. Also, anyone who wants to add some extra nutrition to their diet without sacrificing taste. And let's be real, anyone who wants to feel like a Chia Pet while snacking (just me?).

posts.title: Chia, Chia, Chia! Yupik Organic Raw Black Chia Seeds are Lit!
posts.content:
If you're looking for a versatile and healthy ingredient that can be used in a variety of dishes, then Yupik Organic Raw Black Chia Seeds are definitely worth checking out! As someone who loves to cook without eggs, I'm always on the hunt for good egg substitutes. And chia seeds are a great choice!

Not only are these chia seeds organic, non-GMO, vegan, and gluten-free, but they also have a ton of nutritional benefits. They are high in fiber, protein, and omega-3 fatty acids. Plus, they can help you feel fuller for longer and may even reduce the risk of heart disease.

One of the best things about chia seeds is their ability to absorb liquid and become plump and sweeter when soaked. This makes them perfect for adding to smoothies, oatmeal, or yogurt. You can also use them as an egg replacement in baking. When mixed with water, chia seeds become gel-like and can help bind ingredients together in recipes like brownies or cookies.

On the downside, chia seeds can be a bit expensive, and the black ones can sometimes get stuck in your teeth. But these are minor cons compared to all the benefits you'll get from incorporating chia seeds into your diet.

Overall, Yupik Organic Raw Black Chia Seeds are a great choice for anyone looking for a healthy and versatile ingredient. They're perfect for people with egg allergies or intolerances, and they're a great addition to any pantry. So go ahead and chia it out!

Pros:

- Organic, non-GMO, vegan, and gluten-free
- High in fiber, protein, and omega-3 fatty acids
- Can be used in a variety of dishes
- Great egg substitute for baking

Cons:

- Can be expensive
- Black seeds can get stuck in your teeth

Bottom Line: Yupik Organic Raw Black Chia Seeds are a must-have for anyone looking for a healthy and versatile ingredient. They're packed with nutritional benefits and can be used in a variety of dishes. Just be prepared to spend a bit more on them and watch out for those pesky black seeds! Rating: 9/10
